commands.name: open_file
commands.description: Open a file in the editor
commands.long_description: Opens the specified file in the editor window

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to open

commands.context_notes: Opens a file in the editor tab

commands.name: save_file
commands.description: Save the current file or specified file
commands.long_description: Saves the current file or the specified file to disk

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to save (current if omitted)

commands.context_notes: Saves the file to disk, optionally with a new path

commands.name: find_in_files
commands.description: Search for text pattern in files
commands.long_description: Searches for a specified pattern in files within a directory

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.description: Text pattern to search for

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: Directory to search in (current directory if omitted)

inputs.name: regex
inputs.description: Whether to use regex pattern matching

commands.context_notes: Searches for text in multiple files recursively

commands.name: build_project
commands.description: Build the current project
commands.long_description: Builds the project with the specified configuration

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the project to build

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: Build configuration to use

commands.context_notes: Calls PackageBuild() to build the project with specified configuration

commands.name: clean_project
commands.description: Clean the project build artifacts
commands.long_description: Removes build artifacts from the project

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the project to clean

commands.context_notes: Cleans the output directory of the project

commands.name: goto_line
commands.description: Go to a specific line in the current file
commands.long_description: Moves the cursor to the specified line in the file

inputs.name: line
inputs.description: Line number to go to

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: File to go to line in (current file if omitted)

fields.name: pos
fields.description: Resolved character offset in the file

commands.context_notes: Navigates to a specific line in the in-memory editor buffer

commands.name: search_code
commands.description: Search code across the project
commands.long_description: Searches for symbols, functions, or text across the entire project

inputs.name: query
inputs.description: Search query

commands.context_notes: Searches symbols and references across the project

commands.name: show_console
commands.description: Show the console panel
commands.long_description: Displays the console panel showing build output and messages
commands.context_notes: Shows/hides the console output panel

commands.name: show_errors
commands.description: Show the errors panel
commands.long_description: Displays the errors panel showing compilation errors and warnings
commands.context_notes: Shows/hides the errors and warnings panel

commands.name: set_main_package
commands.description: Set the main package for the project
commands.long_description: Sets the specified package as the main package for the project

inputs.name: package
inputs.description: Name of the package to set as main

commands.context_notes: Changes the main package setting in the project

commands.name: insert_text
commands.description: Insert text at a specific position in a file
commands.long_description: Inserts the specified text at the given position in the file

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to edit

inputs.name: pos
inputs.description: Position (0-based) to insert text at

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Text to insert

commands.context_notes: Operates on in-memory buffer (CoreEditor). File will be persisted to disk when saved with save_file command.

commands.name: erase_range
commands.description: Erase a range of text in a file
commands.long_description: Removes text from the specified position for the given count of characters

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to edit

inputs.name: pos
inputs.description: Starting position (0-based) to erase from

inputs.name: count
inputs.description: Number of characters to erase

commands.context_notes: Operates on in-memory buffer (CoreEditor). File will be persisted to disk when saved with save_file command.

commands.name: replace_all
commands.description: Replace all occurrences of a pattern in a file
commands.long_description: Finds and replaces all occurrences of the pattern with the replacement text

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to edit

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.description: Pattern to find and replace

inputs.name: replacement
inputs.description: Text to replace the pattern with

inputs.name: case_sensitive
inputs.description: Whether the pattern matching is case sensitive

fields.name: replacements
fields.description: Number of replacements made

commands.context_notes: Operates on in-memory buffer (CoreEditor). File will be persisted to disk when saved with save_file command.

commands.name: undo
commands.description: Undo the last edit in a file
commands.long_description: Reverts the last edit operation performed on the file

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to undo changes in

commands.context_notes: Operates on in-memory buffer (CoreEditor). File will be persisted to disk when saved with save_file command.

commands.name: redo
commands.description: Redo the last undone edit in a file
commands.long_description: Re-applies the last edit that was undone on the file

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to redo changes in

commands.context_notes: Operates on in-memory buffer (CoreEditor). File will be persisted to disk when saved with save_file command.

commands.name: find_definition
commands.description: Find the definition of a symbol
commands.long_description: Locates the definition of the specified symbol in the workspace

inputs.name: symbol
inputs.description: Name of the symbol to find the definition for

fields.name: file
fields.description: File containing the definition

fields.name: line
fields.description: Line number of the definition

commands.context_notes: Requires the workspace to be indexed first using the indexing functionality.

commands.name: find_usages
commands.description: Find all usages of a symbol
commands.long_description: Locates all usages of the specified symbol in the workspace

inputs.name: symbol
inputs.description: Name of the symbol to find usages for

fields.name: location
fields.description: File and line number in format 'file:line'

commands.context_notes: Requires the workspace to be indexed first using the indexing functionality.

commands.name: get_build_order
commands.description: Get the build order of packages based on dependencies
commands.long_description: Returns the topological order of packages based on their dependency relationships, which is the order in which packages should be built
commands.context_notes: This command computes the dependency graph and provides the topological sort order for building packages

commands.name: detect_cycles
commands.description: Detect cycles in the package dependency graph
commands.long_description: Identifies cycles in package dependencies that would prevent successful building
commands.context_notes: This command detects if there are circular dependencies in the package graph

commands.name: affected_packages
commands.description: Get packages affected by changes to a file
commands.long_description: Returns the list of packages that would be affected by changes to the specified file, based on package dependency graph

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to check for impact

commands.context_notes: This command performs impact analysis to determine which packages depend (directly or transitively) on the specified file

commands.name: rename_symbol
commands.description: Rename a symbol throughout the workspace
commands.long_description: Renames a symbol (function, variable, class, etc.) throughout the entire workspace, updating all references

inputs.name: old
inputs.description: Current name of the symbol to be renamed

inputs.name: new
inputs.description: New name for the symbol

commands.context_notes: This command performs workspace-wide symbol renaming using the CoreRefactor engine

commands.name: remove_dead_includes
commands.description: Remove unused include directives from a file
commands.long_description: Identifies and removes #include directives that are not referenced anywhere in the file

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to process

fields.name: removed_includes
fields.description: Number of unused includes removed

commands.context_notes: This command uses heuristics to determine which includes are unused and can be safely removed

commands.name: canonicalize_includes
commands.description: Canonicalize include paths in a file
commands.long_description: Standardizes include paths by converting them to the shortest possible relative paths

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to process

fields.name: canonicalized_includes
fields.description: Number of includes that were canonicalized

commands.context_notes: This command resolves relative paths like 'src/../include/foo.h' to canonical forms like 'include/foo.h'

commands.name: workspace_stats
commands.description: Get statistics about the workspace
commands.long_description: Provides detailed statistics about the current workspace including packages, files, and their distribution

fields.name: packages
fields.description: Number of packages in the workspace

fields.name: files
fields.description: Total number of source files

fields.name: extensions
fields.description: Distribution of files by extension

fields.name: largest_file
fields.description: Information about the largest file

fields.name: average_size
fields.description: Average file size in bytes

fields.name: main_package
fields.description: Name of the main package if set

commands.context_notes: This command provides insight into the structure and composition of the workspace

commands.name: package_stats
commands.description: Get statistics about a specific package
commands.long_description: Provides detailed statistics about a specific package including file count, dependencies, and code metrics

inputs.name: package
inputs.description: Name of the package to get statistics for

fields.name: files
fields.description: Number of files in the package

fields.name: uses_count
fields.description: Number of packages this package uses

fields.name: include_count
fields.description: Total number of include directives in the package

fields.name: total_lines
fields.description: Total lines of code in the package

fields.name: file_size_histogram
fields.description: Histogram of file sizes within the package

commands.context_notes: This command provides insight into the structure and complexity of a specific package

commands.name: file_complexity
commands.description: Get complexity metrics for a specific file
commands.long_description: Provides various complexity metrics for a specific source file

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the file to analyze

fields.name: lines
fields.description: Number of lines in the file

fields.name: functions
fields.description: Estimated number of functions in the file

fields.name: includes
fields.description: Number of include directives

fields.name: nesting
fields.description: Maximum nesting depth of code blocks

fields.name: comment_ratio
fields.description: Ratio of comment characters to total characters

commands.context_notes: This command provides insight into the complexity metrics of a specific file

commands.name: graph_stats
commands.description: Get statistics about the dependency graph
commands.long_description: Provides various metrics about the package dependency graph

fields.name: nodes
fields.description: Number of nodes in the dependency graph

fields.name: edges
fields.description: Number of edges in the dependency graph

fields.name: avg_out
fields.description: Average out-degree of nodes

fields.name: cycles
fields.description: Whether the graph contains cycles

fields.name: max_chain
fields.description: Length of the longest dependency chain

fields.name: most_depended_on
fields.description: Package that is most depended upon

commands.context_notes: This command provides insight into the structure and health of the dependency graph

commands.name: edit_history
commands.description: Get history of edits made in the session
commands.long_description: Provides a list of file edits made during the current session with size deltas

fields.name: path
fields.description: Path of the file that was edited

fields.name: delta
fields.description: Change in file size in bytes (negative if file became smaller)

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Time when the edit occurred

commands.context_notes: This command provides insight into the change history during the current session

commands.name: optimize_package
commands.description: Run an iterative optimization loop over a package.
commands.long_description: Runs a series of optimizations repeatedly on a package, measuring improvements between iterations and stopping based on configurable thresholds.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the package to optimize

inputs.name: max_iterations
inputs.description: Maximum number of optimization iterations to perform

inputs.name: converge_threshold
inputs.description: Threshold for determining when optimization has converged

inputs.name: stop_on_worse
inputs.description: Stop the optimization loop if metrics worsen

inputs.name: stop_on_converge
inputs.description: Stop the optimization loop when convergence is detected

fields.name: iterations
fields.description: Details of each optimization iteration

fields.name: reason
fields.description: Reason why the optimization loop terminated

fields.name: success
fields.description: Whether the optimization completed successfully

commands.context_notes: This command performs iterative structural cleanup of a package, potentially removing dead includes, canonicalizing includes, and other refactoring operations.

commands.name: get_optimization_plan
commands.description: Analyze the project and generate an AI-guided improvement plan.
commands.long_description: Analyzes a package and generates a strategic optimization plan with actionable recommendations.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the package to analyze

fields.name: steps
fields.description: List of suggested optimization steps

fields.name: summary
fields.description: Summary of the optimization plan

fields.name: strategy
fields.description: Information about the strategy used to generate the plan

commands.context_notes: This command analyzes the package using the AI Supervisor engine to generate a multi-step improvement plan.

commands.name: workspace_plan
commands.description: Analyze the entire workspace and generate an AI-guided improvement plan.
commands.long_description: Analyzes the entire workspace and generates a strategic optimization plan with actionable recommendations.

fields.name: steps
fields.description: List of suggested optimization steps

fields.name: summary
fields.description: Summary of the optimization plan

fields.name: strategy
fields.description: Information about the strategy used to generate the plan

commands.context_notes: This command analyzes the workspace using the AI Supervisor engine to generate a multi-step improvement plan.

commands.name: list_strategies
commands.description: List all available strategies
commands.long_description: Returns a list of all available strategies with their names and descriptions

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the strategy

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the strategy

commands.context_notes: This command shows all available strategies for the AI Supervisor engine.

commands.name: get_strategy
commands.description: Get information about a specific strategy
commands.long_description: Returns detailed information about a specific strategy or the currently active strategy

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the strategy to get information for. If omitted, returns the active strategy.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the strategy

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the strategy

fields.name: weights
fields.description: Weighting factors used by this strategy

fields.name: thresholds
fields.description: Threshold values used by this strategy

commands.context_notes: This command provides detailed information about a specific strategy including its weights and thresholds.

commands.name: set_strategy
commands.description: Set the current active strategy
commands.long_description: Sets the active strategy for the AI Supervisor engine

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the strategy to activate

commands.context_notes: This command changes the active strategy used by the AI Supervisor for optimization planning.

commands.name: supervisor_front
commands.description: Return the Pareto-optimal suggestions for a package.
commands.context_notes: This command returns the Pareto-optimal subset of suggestions for the given package, using multi-objective optimization.

commands.name: supervisor_rank
commands.description: Rank suggestions by multi-objective weighted score.
commands.context_notes: This command ranks suggestions using a weighted linear combination of multi-objective metrics.
